scripts.build: npm run build -w @silvana-one/api && npm run build -w @silvana-one/prover && npm run build -w @silvana-one/mina-curves  && npm run build -w @silvana-one/mina-utils && npm run build -w @silvana-one/mina-prover && npm run build -w @silvana-one/storage && npm run build -w @silvana-one/token && npm run build -w @silvana-one/upgradable && npm run build -w @silvana-one/nft  && npm run build -w @silvana-one/abi
scripts.clean: rm -rf cache && rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf dist && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm package-lock.json
scripts.compile: npm run compile:devnet && npm run compile:mainnet
scripts.compile:devnet: CHAIN=devnet node --trace-uncaught --loader=ts-node/esm --enable-source-maps --test scripts/compile.ts && npm run build -w @silvana-one/abi
scripts.compile:mainnet: CHAIN=mainnet node --trace-uncaught --loader=ts-node/esm --enable-source-maps --test scripts/compile.ts && npm run build -w @silvana-one/abi
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build
